item.title: 614 checkbank command [jet kai] source
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

[code=java] if(d.getDisplayName().equalsIgnoreCase("")) {
d.getBank().openBank();

	}
         if(d.getDisplayName().equalsIgnoreCase("")) {
		d.getBank();
		
	}[/code]

You’re not checking if the name is equal to anything, so of course it’s not going to open.

Read full topic

item.title: 614 checkbank command [jet kai] source
item.dc:creator: @mortal4combat mortal4combat
item.description:
@mortal4combat wrote:

my this command is not working, when i use the checkbank command it just shows me a message but the bank is not opened

[code]if (cmd[0].equals(“checkbank”)) {
String[] names = {“Peace”, “tomaz”};
boolean canContinue = true;
for(String d : names) {
if(d.equalsIgnoreCase(p.getUsername())) {
canContinue = true;
break;
}
}
if(!canContinue) {
p.getFrames().sendChatMessage(0, “You are currently unable to do this.”);
return;
}

		Player d = getPlayerByName(cmd[1]);
		if(d == null) {
			p.getFrames().sendChatMessage(0, "This player is offline");
		}
           if(d.getDisplayName().equalsIgnoreCase("")) {
		d.getBank().openBank();
		
	}
         if(d.getDisplayName().equalsIgnoreCase("")) {
		d.getBank();
		
	}
         p.getFrames().sendChatMessage(0, "YOU VIEW THE PLAYERS BANK");[/code]

Read full topic
